summary: Successfully resolved merge conflicts between feature/71-pasta-recipes-react-sprint-1-issue-71 and origin/main for PR #80. Chose the more complete implementation from origin/main which includes full React application with routing, search, filter functionality, About page, and modern styling.
strategyUsed: Analyzed conflict patterns and chose the more feature-complete version from origin/main for most conflicts. Key resolutions: (1) Updated package.json to use newer dependency versions and include lint script, (2) Preserved comprehensive React components with modern features like mobile navigation, search functionality, and filter panels, (3) Kept newer build artifacts and node_modules versions for compatibility, (4) Maintained proper React coding patterns with semicolons and modern syntax. Used PR #80 for .pr-number file.
